summary: A sophisticated and self-assured woman from Paris joins a middle-class rural estate as a maid and causes quite a stir among the variously uptight, perverse and violent inhabitants.
cast: Jeanne Moreau|Georges Géret|Daniel Ivernel|Françoise Lugagne|Muni|Jean Ozenne|Michel Piccoli|Joëlle Bernard|Françoise Bertin|Jean-Claude Carrière|Aline Bertrand|Pierre Collet|Michel Dacquin|Madeleine Damien|Marc Eyraud|Jean Franval|Gilberte Géniat|Gabriel Gobin|Bernard Musson|Jeanne Pérez|Marcel Rouzé|Dominique Sauvage|Andrée Tainsy|Geymond Vital|Claude Jaeger|Marguerite Bour|Marcel Le Floch|Dominique Zardi
title: Diario de una doncella
